name: Eerie Spell
description: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

name: Astral Barrage
description: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Thunderous Kick
description: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Surging Strikes
description: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Scorching Sands
description: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Dual Wingbeat
description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Flip Turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Coaching
description: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Poltergeist
description: The user attacks the target by controlling the target's item. The move fails if the target doesn't have an item.

name: Lash Out
description: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If the user's stats were lowered during this turn, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Burning Jealousy
description: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

name: Terrain Pulse
description: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power changes depending on the terrain when it's used.

name: Rising Voltage
description: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move's power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.

name: Misty Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is increased on Misty Terrain.

name: Meteor Beam
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

name: Steel Roller
description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

name: Expanding Force
description: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

name: Eternabeam
description: This is Eternatus's most powerful attack in its original form. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Meteor Assault
description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: False Surrender
description: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Obstruct
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker's Defense stat.

name: Grav Apple
description: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Overdrive
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Branch Poke
description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Pyro Ball
description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Body Press
description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: Clangorous Soul
description: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

name: Max Steelspike
description: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Defense stats.

name: Max Quake
description: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Def stats.

name: Max Mindstorm
description: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Airstream
description: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Speed stats.

name: Max Geyser
description: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

name: Max Ooze
description: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Atk stats.

name: Max Hailstorm
description: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Phantasm
description: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Max Flutterby
description: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Max Flare
description: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

name: Court Change
description: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Bolt Beak
description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Octolock
description: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: Teatime
description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Tar Shot
description: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: No Retreat
description: This move raises all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

name: Stuff Cheeks
description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: Jaw Lock
description: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Snipe Shot
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Dynamax Cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Max Guard
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Veevee Volley
description: The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.

name: Sparkly Swirl
description: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also heals all status conditions of the user's party.

name: Sizzly Slide
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This also leaves the target with a burn.

name: Buzzy Buzz
description: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Bouncy Bubble
description: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Splishy Splash
description: The user charges a huge wave with electricity and hits the opposing Pokémon with the wave. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

name: Clangorous Soulblaze
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user's stats.

name: Splintered Stormshards
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.

name: Lets Snuggle Forever
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, punches the target with full force.

name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Glacial Lance
description: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Light That Burns The Sky
description: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. This move ignores the target's Ability.

name: Fiery Wrath
description: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Photon Geyser
description: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

name: Freezing Glare
description: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Plasma Fists
description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Dragon Energy
description: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: 10 000 000 Volt Thunderbolt
description: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Thunder Cage
description: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

name: Multi Attack
description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move's type.

name: Wicked Blow
description: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Natures Madness
description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.

name: Jungle Healing
description: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.

name: Tearful Look
description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Triple Axel
description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Moongeist Beam
description: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Corrosive Gas
description: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

name: Sunsteel Strike
description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Skitter Smack
description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Prismatic Laser
description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Grassy Glide
description: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

name: Liquidation
description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Shell Side Arm
description: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.

name: Accelerock
description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Scale Shot
description: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Shadow Bone
description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Steel Beam
description: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Life Dew
description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Strange Steam
description: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Fleur Cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spirit Break
description: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Genesis Supernova
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

name: Apple Acid
description: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Extreme Evoboost
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.

name: Breaking Swipe
description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Oceanic Operetta
description: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force.

name: Aura Wheel
description: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

name: Malicious Moonsault
description: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

name: Behemoth Bash
description: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Aurora Veil
description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: Behemoth Blade
description: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Clanging Scales
description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.

name: Snap Trap
description: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Beak Blast
description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Drum Beating
description: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Trop Kick
description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Decorate
description: The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

name: Revelation Dance
description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user's type determines the type of this move.

name: Max Overgrowth
description: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

name: Smart Strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Max Darkness
description: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Max Rockfall
description: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

name: Burn Up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: Max Wyrmwind
description: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Anchor Shot
description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Max Starfall
description: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

name: Pollen Puff
description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Max Knuckle
description: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Attack stats.

name: Throat Chop
description: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

name: Max Strike
description: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Gear Up
description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Max Lightning
description: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

name: Toxic Thread
description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Fishious Rend
description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Strength Sap
description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Dragon Darts
description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: Ice Hammer
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Magic Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

name: Baneful Bunker
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Double Iron Bash
description: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

name: First Impression
description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Freezy Frost
description: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name: Catastropika
description: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

name: Sappy Seed
description: The user grows a gigantic stalk that scatters seeds to attack the target. The seeds drain the target's HP every turn.

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Baddy Bad
description: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon's physical moves.

name: Black Hole Eclipse
description: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Glitzy Glow
description: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon's special moves.

name: Devastating Drake
description: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Pika Papow
description: The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the move's power. It never misses.

name: Subzero Slammer
description: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Floaty Fall
description: The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Shattered Psyche
description: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Zippy Zap
description: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

name: Hydro Vortex
description: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Searing Sunraze Smash
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Never Ending Nightmare
description: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user's Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Mind Blown
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

name: Tectonic Rage
description: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Zing Zap
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

name: All Out Pummeling
description: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Spectral Thief
description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Hyperspace Fury
description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user's Defense stat falls.

name: Shell Trap
description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on opposing Pokémon.

name: Precipice Blades
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Pulverizing Pancake
description: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

name: Origin Pulse
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: Stoked Sparksurfer
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Lands Wrath
description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

name: Soul Stealing 7 Star Strike
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

name: Thousand Waves
description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can't flee from battle.

name: Guardian Of Alola
description: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola's energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target's HP greatly.

name: Power Up Punch
description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

name: Sinister Arrow Raid
description: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

name: Infestation
description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

name: Brutal Swing
description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Hold Back
description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Dragon Hammer
description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: Baby Doll Eyes
description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: Instruct
description: The user instructs the target to use the target's last move again.

name: Hold Hands
description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

name: Core Enforcer
description: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Electric Terrain
description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: Purify
description: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

name: Happy Hour
description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

name: Power Trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Fire Lash
description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Geomancy
description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

name: Lunge
description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Aromatic Mist
description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: Spiky Shield
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Laser Focus
description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Water Shuriken
description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Spotlight
description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Steam Eruption
description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Leafage
description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Diamond Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

name: Solar Blade
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light's energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

name: Confide
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: High Horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: Play Nice
description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Floral Healing
description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

name: Kings Shield
description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also lowers the Attack stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

name: Fairy Lock
description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: Darkest Lariat
description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

name: Boomburst
description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

name: Fairy Wind
description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

name: Shore Up
description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: Flower Shield
description: The user raises the Defense stats of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Crafty Shield
description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

name: Bloom Doom
description: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Parting Shot
description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

name: Disarming Voice
description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Freeze Dry
description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

name: Savage Spin Out
description: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Ion Deluge
description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Continental Crush
description: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Trick Or Treat
description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

name: Acid Downpour
description: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Supersonic Skystrike
description: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Sticky Web
description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

name: Breakneck Blitz
description: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Rototiller
description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Dragon Ascent
description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

name: Mat Block
description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

name: Light Of Ruin
description: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Flying Press
description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: Thousand Arrows
description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

name: Fusion Flare
description: The user brings down a giant flame. This move's power is increased when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

name: Oblivion Wing
description: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: V Create
description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Nuzzle
description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Icicle Crash
description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Celebrate
description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

name: Ice Burn
description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

name: Dazzling Gleam
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: Freeze Shock
description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Powder
description: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

name: Fiery Dance
description: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Venom Drench
description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Bolt Strike
description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Eerie Impulse
description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Relic Song
description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Mystical Fire
description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Hurricane
description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

name: Hyperspace Hole
description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Psystrike
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Moonblast
description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Night Daze
description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Play Rough
description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

name: Leaf Tornado
description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Electrify
description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

name: Heat Crash
description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Misty Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

name: Razor Shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

name: Dragon Tail
description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Draining Kiss
description: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Frost Breath
description: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Topsy Turvy
description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

name: Struggle Bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stats of those hit.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

name: Grass Pledge
description: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

name: Forests Curse
description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

name: Inferno
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Parabolic Charge
description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: Bestow
description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

name: Noble Roar
description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Retaliate
description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move's power is increased.

name: Phantom Force
description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Acrobatics
description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: Belch
description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Circle Throw
description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Fusion Bolt
description: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.

name: Shift Gear
description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

name: Snarl
description: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Hex
description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

name: Blue Flare
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Shell Smash
description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Glaciate
description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stats.

name: Ally Switch
description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

name: Secret Sword
description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

name: Techno Blast
description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move's type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

name: Stored Power
description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

name: Searing Shot
description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Clear Smog
description: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

name: Gear Grind
description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

name: Echoed Voice
description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

name: Head Charge
description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

name: After You
description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Tail Slap
description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

name: Entrainment
description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

name: Cotton Guard
description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.

name: Simple Beam
description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

name: Steamroller
description: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Acid Spray
description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Sacred Sword
description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

name: Low Sweep
description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Horn Leech
description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Soak
description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

name: Heart Stamp
description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Electro Ball
description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Dual Chop
description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Synchronoise
description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Wild Charge
description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Sludge Wave
description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

name: Electroweb
description: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.

name: Storm Throw
description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Work Up
description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: Smack Down
description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

name: Bulldoze
description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

name: Magic Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: Volt Switch
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

name: Fire Pledge
description: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

name: Autotomize
description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: Water Pledge
description: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Final Gambit
description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

name: Psyshock
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Reflect Type
description: The user reflects the target's type, making the user the same type as the target.

name: Wonder Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Quash
description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

name: Power Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Incinerate
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Guard Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

name: Sky Drop
description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Hone Claws
description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: Scald
description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Shadow Force
description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Chip Away
description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

name: Ominous Wind
description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

name: Round
description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.

name: Seed Flare
description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Foul Play
description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage it deals.

name: Dark Void
description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

name: Coil
description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Crush Grip
description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.

name: Flame Charge
description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: Heavy Slam
description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Spacial Rend
description: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Flame Burst
description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

name: Double Hit
description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Telekinesis
description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Magma Storm
description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Roar Of Time
description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Head Smash
description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Heal Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

name: Chatter
description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

name: Defend Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Captivate
description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Attack Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Magnet Bomb
description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

name: Judgment
description: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Cross Poison
description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Grass Knot
description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Power Whip
description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

name: Stealth Rock
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Leaf Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Stone Edge
description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Defog
description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

name: Iron Head
description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Gunk Shot
description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

name: Psycho Cut
description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Mud Bomb
description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Lava Plume
description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

name: Discharge
description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

name: Ice Fang
description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: Draco Meteor
description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Shadow Claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Trick Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Bullet Punch
description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Rock Climb
description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

name: Giga Impact
description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Earth Power
description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Mirror Shot
description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

name: Brave Bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Fire Fang
description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: Focus Blast
description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Thunder Fang
description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Ice Shard
description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Avalanche
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Nasty Plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

name: Force Palm
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Energy Ball
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Magnet Rise
description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: Drain Punch
description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Heart Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

name: Power Gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Sucker Punch

name: Dragon Rush
description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Last Resort

name: Bug Buzz

name: Me First

name: X Scissor
description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Power Trick
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Heal Block

name: Seed Bomb
description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

name: Psycho Shift
description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

name: Night Slash
description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Payback

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

name: U Turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Rock Polish

name: Acupressure

name: Aura Sphere
description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

name: Feint

name: Flare Blitz

name: Gyro Ball
description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: Hammer Arm
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

name: Toxic Spikes

name: Wake Up Slap

name: Worry Seed

name: Miracle Eye

name: Punishment
description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

name: Gravity

name: Guard Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

name: Psycho Boost

name: Power Swap

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

name: Copycat

name: Shock Wave
description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

name: Lucky Chant

name: Rock Blast
description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

name: Gastro Acid
description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Wring Out
description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Trump Card

name: Water Sport
description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

name: Fling

name: Magical Leaf
description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

name: Embargo

name: Volt Tackle
description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

name: Poison Tail
description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Close Combat
description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Mud Shot
description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Metal Burst
description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: Bounce
description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Tailwind

name: Bulk Up

name: Pluck

name: Frenzy Plant

name: Natural Gift
description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

name: Howl
description: The user howls loudly to raise the spirit of itself and allies. This raises their Attack stats.

name: Brine
description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: Iron Defense

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: Roost
description: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Doom Desire
description: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated bundle of light blasts the target.

name: Muddy Water
description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

name: Calm Mind
description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Sand Tomb
description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

name: Covet
description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

name: Cosmic Power
description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Block

name: Tickle
description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Icicle Spear
description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

name: Grass Whistle
description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

name: Sheer Cold
description: The target faints instantly. It's less likely to hit the target if it's used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: Metal Sound
description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

name: Extrasensory
description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Signal Beam
description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. This may also confuse the target.

name: Overheat
description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Water Spout
description: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Weather Ball
description: This attack move varies in power and type depending on the weather.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user's stats.

name: Astonish
description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Air Cutter
description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Hydro Cannon
description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Fake Tears
description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

name: Blast Burn
description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Aromatherapy
description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Meteor Mash
description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

name: Poison Fang
description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Needle Arm
description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Hyper Voice
description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

name: Ice Ball
description: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move's power increases each time it hits.

name: Slack Off
description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Blaze Kick
description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Mud Sport
description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

name: Teeter Dance
description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

name: Feather Dance
description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Mist Ball
description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Luster Purge
description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Tail Glow
description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Camouflage

name: Snatch
description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

name: Arm Thrust

name: Grudge
description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

name: Secret Power
description: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

name: Endeavor

name: Refresh
description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

name: Yawn

name: Imprison

name: Brick Break

name: Eruption

name: Revenge

name: Knock Off

name: Recycle
description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

name: Charge

name: Magic Coat

name: Facade

name: Superpower

name: Hail

name: Ingrain

name: Swallow

name: Assist

name: Spit Up

name: Wish

name: Uproar

name: Role Play
description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's Ability.

name: Whirlpool

name: Trick
description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

name: Ancient Power
description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

name: Helping Hand
description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

name: Crunch
description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Taunt

name: Rain Dance

name: Nature Power

name: Twister

name: Follow Me
description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Smelling Salts
description: This attack's power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target's paralysis, however.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

name: Morning Sun
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Memento
description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Metal Claw
description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

name: Will O Wisp
description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Sweet Scent
description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

name: Flatter

name: Rapid Spin

name: Torment

name: Encore

name: Heat Wave

name: Baton Pass

name: Stockpile

name: Dynamic Punch

name: Fake Out

name: Sacred Fire
description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Beat Up

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

name: Rock Smash
description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Present
description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Future Sight
description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

name: Heal Bell
description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Sleep Talk

name: Extreme Speed
description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Attract
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

name: Psych Up
description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

name: Steel Wing
description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

name: Mirror Coat

name: Fury Cutter
description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

name: Sunny Day
description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

name: False Swipe

name: Hidden Power
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

name: Rollout
description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

name: Endure

name: Vital Throw
description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

name: Sandstorm

name: Iron Tail
description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

name: Outrage

name: Pursuit

name: Lock On

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Octazooka

name: Megahorn

name: Mud Slap

name: Magnitude

name: Sludge Bomb

name: Pain Split

name: Belly Drum
description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

name: Frustration

name: Feint Attack

name: Return

name: Scary Face
description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

name: Mean Look
description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Spite
description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

name: Spark
description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Reversal
description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

name: Milk Drink
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Cotton Spore
description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their Speed stats.

name: Swagger
description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

name: Aeroblast
description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Charm

name: Conversion 2

name: Giga Drain

name: Snore

name: Bone Rush
description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

name: Flame Wheel
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Detect
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Mind Reader
description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

name: Icy Wind
description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

name: Spider Web

name: Perish Song

name: Thief

name: Destiny Bond
description: After using this move, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Triple Kick

name: Foresight

name: Sketch

name: Zap Cannon
description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

name: Slash

name: Spikes

name: Super Fang

name: Sweet Kiss

name: Tri Attack
description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: Mach Punch
description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: Conversion
description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

name: Protect
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Sharpen

name: Powder Snow
description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing Pokémon.

name: Hyper Fang
description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Flail

name: Rock Slide

name: Curse

name: Rest

name: Nightmare

name: Bonemerang

name: Struggle
description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

name: Substitute

name: Psywave
description: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

name: Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

name: Flash
description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

name: Crabhammer
description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Spore
description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Acid Armor
description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Bubble
description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

name: Splash
description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Sky Attack
description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

name: Lovely Kiss
description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

name: Transform

name: Leech Life
description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Barrage
description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

name: Poison Gas
description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

name: Dream Eater
description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: High Jump Kick
description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

name: Glare
description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

name: Kinesis
description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

name: Soft Boiled
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Constrict
description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

name: Amnesia
description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

name: Spike Cannon
description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

name: Clamp
